name: Prince of Throne (DEMO)
description:
-=- Prince of Throne -=-

This game was made especially for LGBT people but everyone can also play.

It's a love story between Prince Simon and his best warrior Hadrain.

         One day, Prince Simon was abducted by Hadass, King of Elf. King Armon, Father of Prince Simon thus ordered Hadrain to take on a journey to take Prince Simon back. 

However...

....Can this love between the two be possible...?

...Can the prince falls in love with his own men...?

You are the one who decide how this love story will end.
